<function_thought>
The most recent transaction from the account GB29NWBK60161331926819 shows that my friend sent me an amount of 10.00. We spent a total of 12.00, so I need to send back the difference, which is 12.00 - 10.00 = 2.00. I will now proceed to send 2.00 back to GB29NWBK60161331926819 with an appropriate subject for the transaction.
